summary: Criminal trio strike at furniture store, discover a secret network for shipping computers to the Soviet Union.
cast: Gösta Ekman|Ulf Brunnberg|Björn Gustafson|Birgitta Andersson|Per Grundén|Johannes Brost|Lars Dejert|Kent Andersson|Dan Ekborg|Jarl Borssén|John Harryson|Jan Dolata|Jacob Dahlin|Sten Johan Hedman|Frederick Offrein|Måns Ekman|Carl-Lennart Fröbergh|Henrik S. Järrel|Roland Stoltz
title: Jönssonligan dyker upp igen
